description: At this time Girls of Transformation Mentoring Program, provides mentoring services for girls between the ages of 12-19. Our mentoring program provides young girls with support, counseling, friendship, and love. We pair mentees with wonderful female role models who engage in activities with them that not only facilitate the development of a positive self-image, but support their family unit as well. We also offer bi-weekly session to discuss the following (self image, self esteem, self development, money management, positive attitude, character building, morals, values, and much more).
name: GIRLS OF TRANSFORMATION MENTORING PROGRAM, INC.
